action.action-desc: Ms. Herrera Beutler (for herself and Mr. Higgins of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To provide first responders with planning, training, and equipment capabilities for crude oil-by-rail and ethanol-by-rail derailment and incident response, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fire Department Proper Response and Equipment Prioritization Act.

section.header: Support for firefighters for crude oil-by-rail and ethanol-by-rail derailment and incident response
section.text: Section 33(c) of the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974 (15 U.S.C. 2229(c)) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: The Administrator of FEMA shall, in carrying out this section, give high priority consideration to grants providing for planning, training, and equipment to firefighters for crude oil-by-rail and ethanol-by-rail derailment and incident response.
